title: Tabletop
description: View and crop images from your webcam. Download the result.

title: Masks
description: Collage faces using your webcam.

title: Grain
description: Progressively pixelate an image.

title: Conservation
description: An experimental drawing app where the total RGB values are always preserved.

title: CSS Paint
description: Paint using brushes defined in CSS. An ode to the power of CSS and an experiment in giving people weird building blocks.

title: Nest
description: An experimental webpage-builder. Add content like a text document. Blocks can be nested to organize and structure. Use custom CSS and classes for layout and style.

title: Grid
description: An experimental text editor. Adjust the grid size and text direction to create weird and expressive layouts.

title: Cascade
description: An experiment in collaborative CSS. Style is determined by the most recent 32 posts.

title: csOS
description: Use the Constraint Systems collection of experimental creative tools all together in one place.

title: Mosaic
description: Recreate one image using the tiles from another image.

title: Collage
description: An experimental public collage that combines images according to their complexity.

title: Type
description: A directed typing experiment. You choose the direction the letters should flow.

title: Push
description: Push and pull blocks to distort an image.

title: Flow
description: An experimental image editor that lets you set and direct pixel-flows.

title: Fracture
description: Shatter and recombine images using a grid of viewports.

title: Tri
description: Tri is an experimental image distorter. You can choose an image to render using a WebGL quad, adjust the texture and position coordinates to create different distortions, and save the result.

title: Tile
description: Layout images using a tiling tree layout. Move, split, and resize images using keyboard controls.

title: Sift
description: Slice an image into multiple layers. You can offset the slices to create interference patterns and pseudo-3D effects.

title: Automadraw
description: Draw and evolve your drawing using cellular automata on a pixel grid with two keyboard-controlled cursors.

title: Span
description: Lay out and rearrange text, line by line, using keyboard controls.

title: Stamp
description: Image-paint from a source image palette using keyboard controls.

title: Collapse
description: Collapse an image into itself using ranked superpixels.

title: Res
description: Selectively pixelate an image using a compression algorithm.

title: Rgb
description: Pixel-paint using keyboard controls.

title: Face
description: Edit both the text and the font it is rendered in.

title: Pal
description: Apply an eight-color terminal color scheme to an image. Use the keyboard controls to choose a theme, set thresholds, and cycle hues.

title: Bix
description: Draw on binary to glitch text.

title: Diptych
description: Pixel-reflow an image to match the dimensions of your text. Save the result as a diptych.

title: Slide
description: Divide and slide-stretch an image using keyboard controls.

title: Freeconfig
description: Push around image pixels in blocks.

title: Moire
description: Generate angular skyscapes using Asteroids-like ship controls.

title: Hex
description: A keyboard-driven, grid-based drawing tool.

title: Etch
description: A keyboard-based pixel drawing tool.
